SHR MaximumDosePerTimePeriod Profile

The maximum amount of a medication to be taken in a given period of time.

SHR Mapping Summary

shr.medication.MaximumDosePerTimePeriod maps to Ratio:
  AmountOfMedication maps to numerator
  Duration maps to denominator
